alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:04PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Stillwater, southwestern Musselshell, west central Yellowstone and southeastern Golden Valley Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 402 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 17 miles northwest of Billings, moving east at 35 mph. Additional storms were in between Raplje and Ryegate. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Billings, Roundup, Ryegate, Lockwood, Shepherd, Billings Heights, Billings West End, Broadview, Lavina, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Hailstone Wildlife Refuge, Molt, Acton, Klein, Rapelje and Comanche. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone
